item.title: Projects
item.description: Some of the personal projects I’ve worked on with accompanying descriptions.

item.title: Snake with ncurses
item.description: Snake A terminal implementation of snake built in C with GNU ncurses. This was both my first graphical (sorta) application in C, and also my first game. It features multiple levels, with different rates of movement and score increases per food consumed. As far as I can tell, the rules I’ve implemented are consistent with typical snake games. There were a few minor things I didn’t love and would consider changing:
